# YesSiR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of the *YesSiR* package is to generate automatic report based on the *FactoMineR* and *officer* packages. Reports are issued from multivariate analyses such as MCA and PCA. To use the package you have to use the *.pptx* file included in the package. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of YesSiR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Sebastien-Le/YesSiR")
```
